page.title: 09TRANSPORT
page.content:
{BUS SERVICES}- The number{51}bus runs from the centre to Bromley Heath. The number{52}bus goes through the centre to Rookery Farm Estate. The No{53}bus goes from Blackhorse to Hengrove via the centre. The{X62}goes through the centre to Mangotsfield.The No{325}bus goes through Bristol to Old Sodbury. The{329}goes to Hawkesbury Upton via Downend. The{397}goes from Downend to Winterbourne. Numbers{323}and{328}go from the centre via Frenchay village and Hambrook to Wotton-under-Edge. There are no bus stations in the area, but there are a lot of bus stops. Many people travel into Bristol by bus each day to work.
{OTHER TRANSPORT}- On the busy and dan- gerous roads there are many different types of transport including lorries, coaches, cars, cycles and motorcycles.
